headline: Ask HN: How to improve my interview performance
description:
I hugely under perform at interviews. Mostly because I turn into a hot mess and lose organization when discussing my experiences during interviews.

I've done some of the typical stuff like writing down key points and rehearing answers ahead of the interview. I also seem to do ok with the coaches I've occasionally enlisted.

Love to hear from someone who has solved a similar problem.

I am also curious how and how much do most people practice (esp the ones who aren't exactly glib talkers)
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何提高我的面试表现
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何提高我的面試表現
description_zh-Hans:
我在面试中的表现严重不足。

我已经做了一些典型的工作，如在面试前写下关键点和重新演练答案。

我也很好奇，大多数人是如何练习的，练习了多少次（尤其是那些不善言辞的人）。
description_zh-Hant:
我在面試中的表現嚴重不足。

我已經做了一些典型的工作，如在面試前寫下關鍵點和重新演練答案。

我也很好奇，大多數人是如何練習的，練習了多少次（尤其是那些不善言辭的人）。
